Pre-Game Insights: Cameroon's recent performance have been less than stellar, marked by a drawn warm-up match against Zambia and being held to a tie by Libya in a World Cup qualifier back in November.
Guinea enter the upcoming match with high confidence, having secured a friendly victory against Nigeria.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is scheduled to take place on January 15, 2024, at 05:00 PM GMT (10:30 PM IST) at the Charles Konan Banny Stadium.
Guinea have won the previous two matches against Cameroon.
In their most recent six encounters, Cameroon and Guinea have each secured victory twice, with two matches ending in draws.
Others: Frank Magri, the young Cameroonian striker currently playing for Toulouse in Ligue 1, is known for a distinct playing style that blends finesse with a ruthless finishing instinct.
Serhou Guirassy has netted 17 goals in 14 Bundesliga matches for Stuttgart in the 2023-24 season
